title: Game isn't loading in?
body:
Hey i need to contact the help and support group, I have started a game and it hasn't loaded off the champion select screen yet after 10 minutes, other people in the game are having the same problem as i was able to continue to type to them,I have restarted my game multiple times. I am now stuck on the reconnect screen. Are you able to fix this???!
http://gyazo.com/3f230cc719c9627c5459e43004ccb1d7

replies.body:
after game finished, waiting for stats never ended either
http://puu.sh/e6wXJ/61ded6a89a.jpg
After about 1 hour my league started to respond, and mine too is back up.

Yeah I tried to start a poro king game, the countdown timer on the hero select screen ended, but the game never loaded into the startup screen.  I restarted my computer and I too am stuck on the reconnect to game.  Hopefully I don't get penalised for this as if I left the game as I didn't!
